Posts.Content: Feb 2, 2011 03:46PM crog234 wrote: Thanks Alice  Sorry to hear of your problems but glad you seem to have a good attitude about it...  My first day of Chemo went fine.  They gave me lots of nausea medicine and then I have 3 different kinds for here at home.  Ate supper just fine last night.  Slept all night (except for 1 bathroom trip).  Ate breakfast fine this morning.  Did take my nausea pill that they said to take.  Had the Nulesta shot yesterday instead of today as they were going to be closed today becuase of the snow storm.  I have some claritan here to take if I feel and pain from the nulesta.  Have had to make up charts to keep all the medicine straight....A/C everyother week for 4 weeks.  Then will do Taxol everyother week for 4 weeks.  Will have a rest and then will do radiation for 5 weeks everyday.  Cindy  Diag 12/16/10   ILC  ER/PR+, HER2-
